Package arcade.core.env.lattice

Interface Lattice

  • All Superinterfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, sim.engine.Steppable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    PatchLattice, PatchLatticeRect, PatchLatticeTri
    public interface Lattice
extends sim.engine.Steppable
    A Lattice represents an environment layer.

    Each lattice is a 3D array of doubles, where the values can represent molecular concentrations or other continuous quantities. Each lattice is associated with Operation objects that characterize environmental behaviors. The Operation object(s) are stepped during the step method of the Lattice.
